name: MINUTE BALL
description:
WELCOME TO MINUTE BALL!!!

-== CONTROLS ==-

WASD - Player 1

Arrow keys - Player 2

-== OBJECTIVE ==-

Score as many goals as possible in 1 minute!!!

-== OR ELSE ==-

You will never win your freedom from the island of forced sporting events!!! >:D

-== MADE BY ==-

Jack & Alyssa in 72 hours for One Minute Game jam #2
